text:
Hey <@U06GKDGSZJ6>,
should be possible with a workflow, lists and <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/website-pages/create-and-manage-smart-content-rules|smart-content>.
The logic could look like this:

Workflow:
If person selected "Developer" in "any form" -> add this person to list "Developer; elif person selected "Marketer" in "any form" -> add this person to list "Marketer"...

Page(s)/Smart-Content:
If person is in list "Developer" redirect to "Page X" - if person is in list "Marketer" redirect to "Page Y"


Or you can simply modify the whole thank you page/all modules on it with smart-content like:
If person is in list "Developer" - show "Hello world" as title; If person is in list "Marketer" - show "Good morning Marketer"....
